00010 typedef struct _MIR
00011 {
00012 int   area;           /* pattern that lower-left corner of layout occupies when...  */
00013 int   morearea;           /*             (pattern that rest of layout occupies when...) */
00014 short mtx[6];             /* ...this operation is applied on it.  */
00015 }
00016 MIR,*MIRPTR;

00019 typedef struct _PLAZGLAF
00020 {
00021 MIRPTR       mlist;       /* array of MIR representing the mirrored area */
00022 int      more;        /* number of repetitions of morearea (0 means no rep.) */
00023 LAYOUTPTR    layout;      /* pointer to the layout we're talking about */
00024 LAYINSTPTR       layinst;     /* list of all layinstances that refer to this layout */
00025 FLAG         flag;        /* support for fillplaza */
00026 struct _PLAZGLAF *next;       /* next in list */
00027 }
00028 PLAZGLAF,*PLAZGLAFPTR;        /* linked to LAYOUT.flag */
00029 
00030 
00031 typedef struct _PIVOT
00032 {
00033 int          x,y;         /* current pivot position (0<=x<lx && 0<=y<ly) */
00034 int          lx,ly;       /* size of the plaza. */
00035 int          wx,wy,wlx,wly;   /* sub-window coordinates and size */
00036 short        wbbx[2];         /* actual window bounding box */
00037 int          numsectors;      /* total number of sectors in entire layout */
00038 int          **plaza;         /* the plaza matrix, size [lx,ly] */
00039 PLAZGLAFPTR  children;        /* list of all layouts that child layinstances refer to */
00040 int          maxmore;         /* maximum of al the "more" fields in children */
00041 LAYOUTPTR    father;          /* the father layout */
00042 IMAGEDESCPTR imagedesc;       /* reference to the the image description */
00043 }
00044 PIVOT,*PIVOTPTR;
